Alchemist.affirmation: Your curiosity is a kiln—ideas become form when you touch them.
insights: You thrive with small, repeatable experiments and reflective check-ins.
Rituals that mark iteration (start/stop/learn) nourish your momentum.
reflection_questions: Where can you lower the stakes to test something this week?
What simple ritual helps you notice when an experiment is working?

Keystone.affirmation: Your steadiness is a shelter; people exhale around you.
insights: Clear boundaries protect your capacity for care.
Your pacing sets a healthy rhythm for relationships and projects.
reflection_questions: What limit protects your energy today?
Where can you ask for co-responsibility to share the load?

Catalyst.affirmation: You light the match and guide the flame.
insights: Momentum comes from framing a first, smallest step.
Leadership shows up as invitations with clarity and options.
reflection_questions: What is the 10-minute version of the next move?
Who needs context to say yes more easily?

Explorer.affirmation: New paths appear because you’re willing to look.
insights: Play is a legitimate method—follow signals, not scripts.
You learn fastest with safe constraints: time boxes, debriefs.
reflection_questions: What’s a low-risk sandbox you can try today?
How will you capture what surprised you?

Vanguard.affirmation: Your foresight steadies motion without stifling it.
insights: You translate vision into scaffolding that others can climb.
Boundaries are creative tools, not just fences.
reflection_questions: Which boundary is actually a structure you can build with?
What risk deserves a contingency plan (not a stop sign)?
